messagePattern: Attempting to queue task %s when task is already queued.
VirtualProcessorUnit passed a name '%s' but Zemeckis.areNamesEnabled() is false
VirtualProcessorUnit.getName() invoked when Zemeckis.areNamesEnabled() is false
Attempting to activate VirtualProcessorUnit named '%s' but an existing VirtualProcessorUnit named '%s' is activated
Attempting to deactivate VirtualProcessorUnit named '%s' but no VirtualProcessorUnit is activated
Attempting to add handler %s that is already in the list of error handlers.
Attempting to remove handler %s that is not in the list of error handlers.
Scheduler.schedule(...) passed a negative delay. Actual value passed is %s
Scheduler.scheduleAtFixedRate(...) passed a non-positive period. Actual value passed is %s
Runaway task(s) detected. Tasks still running after %s rounds. Current tasks include: [%s]
Scheduler.becomeMacroTask(...) invoked but the VirtualProcessorUnit named '%s' is already active
